This work was supported by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research
(BMBF), grant 01LP1611A (G.D.C. and D.C.) and the Netherlands Organisation for
c Research (NWO), grant 016.Vidi.171011 (D.C.). S.W. is supported by the the
ce of Science, Biological and Environmental Research
program (BER) grant DESC0016605 and the Utah Agricultural Experiment Station, Utah
State University, with partial support from the Central Weather Bureau of Taiwan.
Further support was provided by the U.S. National Science Foundation, grants PLR-
1304398 and AGS-1640452 (S.V.). L.W. was supported by NASA grant 80NSSC17K0267,
NSF grant AGS-1552385, and a grant from the Harvard Global Institute.
D.C. initiated this review paper and developed the concept, and all authors (D.C., G.D.C.,
S.V., L.W. and S.W.) contributed equally to the writing of the manuscript.
The authors declare no competing interests.
